En enregistrant votre nom sur l'Internet:
By registering your name on the Internet, the registrar
                                        (randy@psg.com), IANA, and NSF (National Science Foundation) accept

Notre rôle quant à l'enregistrement de n:
Our role in registering names on the Internet is
                                        to ensure that the name does not conflict with any other in the domain
                                        demand.
La partie demandant l'enregistrement de:
The party requesting the registration of this name certifies that at its

                                        filed or other status.
Enregistrer un nom de domaine ne confère:
Registering a domain name does not confer any legal rights to that name.
